title: [Large-Scale] Online Library Education Tutorial: Self-Directed Learning for Pre-Service Teachers

context.additional_context: Fostering library resource utilization skills for pre-service/in-service teachers in language education research and lesson design.

learning_goals: Learners can search and filter academic resources related to topics in an online library system
Learners can explain three or more criteria for assessing the credibility of search results
Learners can pass interactive quizzes with over 80% accuracy after completing tutorials
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
